title: ISO 8601-1:2019 Local Time of Day - Hour Only (Basic Format)
description: A representation of local time of day with reduced precision to hour only in basic format ["T"][hh] where the time designator "T" may be omitted by mutual agreement (ยง5.3.1.3 c)
$comment: Extended format is not applicable for hour-only representations as there are no separators to extend
